Steps.Message: Update at 20:46 - Engineers are on their way back to the Cameron Road area to investigate the ongoing fault. To give the team time to complete their work, we're now aiming to have power back on between 00:00 and 01:00. We're really sorry this is taking longer and we'll keep you updated.

We became aware of a power cut at 18:37. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 20:46 - Engineers are on their way back to the Cameron Road area to investigate the ongoing fault. To give the team time to complete their work, we're now aiming to have power back on between 00:00 and 01:00. We're really sorry this is taking longer and we'll keep you updated.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
